name: Bombadill
description:
Controls:

  • X - Roll
  • C - Scoop
  • Z - Hide the Dice

The nasty criminal group known as the Bombadill Gang have cast you out and left you for dead!

After several years you approach their den once more to settle your debts and claim revenge. You must face several wacky characters out of a prohibition-era fantasy world and win a dice game of chance and guts to set things straight. 

Just make sure the police don't catch you commiserating with these lowlifes!
